title: One platform for managing fund data. Simple and precise.
text: The most efficient way to accelerate your time to market and provide the right information to regulators.

title: Create value at every stage of the life cycle.
text: We can help you meet any requirements resulting from changing regulations throughout the fund lifecycle.

cards.title: Transparency
cards.text: Enhance visualization, calculations, outputs, and insights.

title: What our clients say
text: “In less than five minutes, we were set up for the product and had calculated, validated and published a DCPT for one of our funds. To be able to do this so quickly is nothing short of spectacular!”

title: How accurate is the data you publish?
text: The true cost of poor data quality is enormous. Take our free data diagnostic and put your data consistency to the test.

title: Get started.
text: All your fund data lives on one platform, where KNEIP’s publication controls ensure it stays accurate.
